description: Like all civ games, this is an excellent time sink. Wicked addictive, so you should avoid it if you need to get work done. Nevertheless, I cannot help but fire this game up every so often, when I want to play a casual game.

If you like games that make you think and have a lot of time on your hands, hive this a shot! It's a bit frustrating until you figure out the controls, but after that it's quite entertaining. Make sure to install the `freeciv-sound-standard` package if you want sound though
gefällt mir, so wie das Original
I really like it, but it need more content.
